name: Black on Black: The Card Game
overview: Black on Black: The Card Game is a game developed by Logiker and released into the public domain on April 15, 2023. In this game, you simply have to count the cards on each stack. First cards appear, then cards get moved. That's it! Eeach round, more cards are added and more moves are done. You have to guess all four cards right in order to advance to another round, otherwise it's game over.
